department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Bid totals submission deadline: June 2, 2023, at 14:00 EDT. This bid solicitation is for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement method of supply in the National Capital Region.
duration_in_months: Headless solicitation based on Expression of Interest
full_summary:
* **Tender Title (English & French)**: E60ZR-212358-A - GCcase IT Professional Services (English) / E60ZR-212358-A - Services professionnels en TI de GCcase (French)
* **Reference Number**: WS3856775304-Doc3968722469
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3856775304
* **Publication Date**: April 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 2, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* **Amendment Date**: May 30, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 18, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: June 30, 2023
* **Tender Status (English & French)**: Expired (Expiré)
* **Goods and Services Description**: Information Technology Consultation Services (eng)/Services de conseils en informatique (fra)
* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering (Concurrentielle - Appel d’offres sélectif)
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price (Cote combinée la plus élevée pour le mérite technique et le prix)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada (Canada)
* **Contracting Authority**: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* **Contact Information**: Alain Huot (SPAC/PWGS), alain.huot@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Public Notice**: This tender is issued under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) method to satisfy the requirement of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (
